item.title: DOJ says more than 1 million potential Epstein files newly uncovered
item.description: A bipartisan group of Senators on Wednesday said the Trump administration violated the law by failing to release the records in full last week.

item.title: Libyan army's chief dies in plane crash in Turkey
item.description: The Libyan army's chief of staff, Mohammed Ali Ahmed Al-Haddad, died in a plane crash on Tuesday after leaving Turkey's capital Ankara, the prime mini...

item.title: Supreme Court rejects Trump's bid to send National Guard to Chicago
item.description: In an unsigned decision released on Tuesday, the court said Trump lacked the authority to federalize troops in Chicago.

item.title: Epstein files: Latest batch from DOJ includes a personal letter, emails and heavily redacted documents
item.description: The release comes amid intense scrutiny from congressional lawmakers and victims over the DOJ's handling of the Epstein files.

item.title: Greenland PM rebukes Trump special envoy overture
item.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday appointed Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry as a "special envoy" to Greenland.
